channel.title: Ryan Griego's blog
channel.description: I went from being a graphic design major to a software engineer. Welcome to my blog!

item.title: Building The Price is Right: An Autonomous AI Deal Discovery System
item.description: A hands-on look at fine-tuning open source AI models using LoRA/QLoRA techniques on Amazon product data. I discovered how a fine-tuned 8B parameter model outperformed GPT-4o and Claude, while navigating the practical challenges of limited GPU resources and hyperparameter optimization.
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)
